metadata.localname: A Song of Our True Nature

value.verse: Christ revealed our frailty and our falling, *
Christ also revealed his blessed power, *
He protects us as tenderly and as sweetly when we are in greatest need; *
value.halfverse:
he raises us in spirit
and turns everything to glory and joy without ending.
God is the true father and mother of natures.
value.verse: God is the ground and the substance, the very essence of nature; *

value.halfverse: and we are all bound to God by grace.
value.verse: We are all bound to God by nature, *
And this grace is for all the world, *
value.halfverse: because it is our precious mother, Christ.

value.verse:
For this fair nature was prepared by Christ
for the honor and nobility of all, *
value.halfverse: and for the joy and bliss of salvation.
